definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: More and more people are forgetting the saying, "Pride comes before a fall."
sentences.chinese: 有愈來愈多的人忘記了“驕者必敗”這句俗話。

sentences.english: We should always remember the saying. "Pride comes before a fall."
sentences.chinese: 我們應該隨時記住這個俗語“驕者必敗”。

sentences.english: The teachings of Confucius tell us to be humble.
sentences.chinese: 驕者必敗孔子教導我們要謙虛。

sentences.english: You think you are one of the high and mighty, remember pride goes before a fall.
sentences.chinese: 自以爲是了不起的人物，別忘了驕者必敗。
